column3: Traffic;PHNOM PENH: A------ heavily drunk driver who crashed into a road divider damaged his car.------The incident occurred at 11:40 pm on the 14th of February
column5: along Monivong Boulevard.------A source from the scene said the car was driven by a drunk man at high speed. The left side of the vehicle hit the concrete
column6: but after the impact the owner of the car was too drunk and fell asleep.------After the incident
column7: local authorities removed the car to the municipal police station
column8: waiting for the owner to settle later (*presumably after he sobered up). ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/413765
